titles.title: Richard G. Lugar and Ellen O. Tauscher Act to Maintain Limits on Russian Nuclear Forces
Richard G. Lugar and Ellen O. Tauscher Act to Maintain Limits on Russian Nuclear Forces
To require certain reports and briefings to Congress relating to the expiration of the New START Treaty, and for other purposes.
Richard G. Lugar and Ellen O. Tauscher Act to Maintain Limits on Russian Nuclear Forces

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
